title: About the ranked rewards
body:
Do you need honor level 2 to receive it?

I just got chat banned for calling a guy i was arguing with in post-game lobby a retard. Kind of annoying because its not like there was anyone else there and he could have left at any time so i dont really see why its punishable but whatever.

Is it even possible to get back to honor 2 before rewards drop or do i really lose a whole years worth of effort because of this

replies.body:
Since you weren't banned, only given a chat restriction, you can get your rewards back if you hit Honour 2 again.

The issue is first unlocking your Honour level in order to progress, and second to actually get there.

However, this is entirely possible!!! Based on what Riot have said, you get the same amount of Honour regardless of game length. So many short games = more honour than fewer long games.

So basically... spam Intro bots (or Beginner if Intro doesn't give honour) until the end of the season. Might take 100 Intro/Beginner bot games, but this is entirely manageable.

This would be much easier if OCE had Treeline Bots, since you can finish matches in 9 minutes.

Hope this helps :)
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

You need to be Honour 2 to receive ranked rewards. It typically takes 3-4 weeks to advance a checkpoint (since honour is a season long achievement) so it's very unlikely you will receive rewards for this year.
